languages.text: "Да. И это было крайне глупое решение. Есть более надежные способы продезинфицировать местность, не теряя при этом целый астероид. А тот маневр дестабилизировал структуру станции так, что последствия давали о себе знать годами. Уже мне после заступления на пост Наместника пришлось договариваться с {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецами{/g} о ремонтных работах, и стоило это невероятных денег и ресурсов".

"Yes, he did. And what a senseless decision it was. There are more reliable ways of disinfecting an area without having to lose a whole asteroid. That manoeuvre of his destabilised the station's integrity, and the consequences of that were still being felt up until I became Liege. When I entered office, I had to negotiate with the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} to make necessary repairs, and it cost me a preposterous amount of money and resources."
languages.original_text: "Да. И это было крайне глупое решение. Есть более надежные способы продезинфицировать местность, не теряя при этом целый астероид. А тот маневр дестабилизировал структуру станции так, что последствия давали о себе знать годами. Уже мне после заступления на пост Наместника пришлось договариваться с {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецами{/g} о ремонтных работах, и стоило это невероятных денег и ресурсов".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, he did. And what a senseless decision it was. There are more reliable ways of disinfecting an area without having to lose a whole asteroid. And that manoeuvre of his destabilised the station's integrity to the point where it would have to deal with the consequences for years to come. It was after I had entered office that I had to negotiate with the Tech-Priests to make the repairs, and it cost me a preposterous amount of money and resources."
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

traits.locale_text: "Yes, he did. And what a senseless decision it was. There are more reliable ways of disinfecting an area without having to lose a whole asteroid. And that manoeuvre of his destabilised the station's integrity to the point where it would have to deal with the consequences for years to come. It was after I had entered office that I had to negotiate with the Tech-Priests to make the repairs, and it cost me a preposterous amount of money and resources."
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

traits.locale_text: "Yes, he did. And what a senseless decision it was. There are more reliable ways of disinfecting an area without having to lose a whole asteroid. That manoeuvre of his destabilised the station's integrity, and the consequences of that were still being felt up until I became Liege. When I entered office, I had to negotiate with the Tech-Priests to make necessary repairs, and it cost me a preposterous amount of money and resources."
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

traits.locale_text: "Yes, he did. And what a senseless decision it was. There are more reliable ways of disinfecting an area without having to lose a whole asteroid. That manoeuvre of his destabilised the station's integrity, and the consequences of that were still being felt up until I became Liege. When I entered office, I had to negotiate with the Tech-Priests to make necessary repairs, and it cost me a preposterous amount of money and resources."
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

traits.locale_text: "Yes, he did. And what a senseless decision it was. There are more reliable ways of disinfecting an area without having to lose a whole asteroid. That manoeuvre of his destabilised the station's integrity, and the consequences of that were still being felt up until I became Liege. When I entered office, I had to negotiate with the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} to make necessary repairs, and it cost me a preposterous amount of money and resources."
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

languages.text: 「あぁ、そうだ。何て愚かな決断だったことか。小惑星が丸々なくならずに済む、もっと良いエリアの消毒方法があったのだ。あの作戦のせいでステーションの完全性を損ない、その影響は私がリージュになるまで感じるところだった。私がオフィスに入ったとき、必要な修理を行うために{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}と交渉して、途方もない金額と資源が必要になったのだよ」
languages.original_text: "Yes, he did. And what a senseless decision it was. There are more reliable ways of disinfecting an area without having to lose a whole asteroid. That manoeuvre of his destabilised the station's integrity, and the consequences of that were still being felt up until I became Liege. When I entered office, I had to negotiate with the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} to make necessary repairs, and it cost me a preposterous amount of money and resources."

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、そうだ。何て愚かな決断だったことか。小惑星が丸々なくならずに済む、もっと良いエリアの消毒方法があったのだ。あの作戦のせいでステーションの完全性を損ない、その影響は私がリージュになるまで感じるところだった。私がオフィスに入ったとき、必要な修理を行うために{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}と交渉して、途方もない金額と資源が必要になったのだよ」
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

languages.text: “没错，他确实是这么做的，何等愚蠢的决定。明明有很多更可靠的方法，可以将一片区域彻底消杀，没必要将整颗小行星完全放弃。他的做法破坏了落脚港的完整性，即便是在我上任之后，我依然能感觉到他的行为造成的后果。当我上任的时候，我不得不与{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}协商，进行必要的维修。这花费了我大量的金钱与资源。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, he did. And what a senseless decision it was. There are more reliable ways of disinfecting an area without having to lose a whole asteroid. That manoeuvre of his destabilised the station's integrity, and the consequences of that were still being felt up until I became Liege. When I entered office, I had to negotiate with the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} to make necessary repairs, and it cost me a preposterous amount of money and resources."

traits.locale_text: “没错，他确实是这么做的，何等愚蠢的决定。明明有很多更可靠的方法，可以将一片区域彻底消杀，没必要将整颗小行星完全放弃。他的做法破坏了落脚港的完整性，即便是在我上任之后，我依然能感觉到他的行为造成的后果。当我上任的时候，我不得不与{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}协商，进行必要的维修。这花费了我大量的金钱与资源。”
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

languages.text: «Así es, una decisión que no me cabe en la cabeza. Hay métodos más eficaces de purgar una zona sin perder un asteroide entero. Aquella maniobra desestabilizó la integridad de la estación y sus consecuencias siguieron patentes hasta que asumí el cargo de Señor. Cuando entré en funciones, tuve que negociar con los {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g} para llevar a cabo las reparaciones necesarias, que costaron una cifra absurda de dinero y recursos».
languages.original_text: "Yes, he did. And what a senseless decision it was. There are more reliable ways of disinfecting an area without having to lose a whole asteroid. That manoeuvre of his destabilised the station's integrity, and the consequences of that were still being felt up until I became Liege. When I entered office, I had to negotiate with the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} to make necessary repairs, and it cost me a preposterous amount of money and resources."

traits.locale_text: «Así es, una decisión que no me cabe en la cabeza. Hay métodos más eficaces de purgar una zona sin perder un asteroide entero. Aquella maniobra desestabilizó la integridad de la estación y sus consecuencias siguieron patentes hasta que asumí el cargo de Señor. Cuando entré en funciones, tuve que negociar con los {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g} para llevar a cabo las reparaciones necesarias, que costaron una cifra absurda de dinero y recursos».
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

languages.text: « C'est exact. Une décision insensée, si vous voulez mon avis. Il existe des moyens bien plus efficaces de désinfecter une zone sans sacrifier un astéroïde tout entier. Sa petite manœuvre a déstabilisé l'intégrité de la station, et les conséquences se faisaient encore sentir lorsque je suis devenu suzerain. À mon arrivée au poste, j'ai dû négocier avec les {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g} pour procéder aux réparations nécessaires, ce qui m'a coûté une quantité scandaleuse d'argent et de ressources. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, he did. And what a senseless decision it was. There are more reliable ways of disinfecting an area without having to lose a whole asteroid. That manoeuvre of his destabilised the station's integrity, and the consequences of that were still being felt up until I became Liege. When I entered office, I had to negotiate with the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} to make necessary repairs, and it cost me a preposterous amount of money and resources."

traits.locale_text: « C'est exact. Une décision insensée, si vous voulez mon avis. Il existe des moyens bien plus efficaces de désinfecter une zone sans sacrifier un astéroïde tout entier. Sa petite manœuvre a déstabilisé l'intégrité de la station, et les conséquences se faisaient encore sentir lorsque je suis devenu suzerain. À mon arrivée au poste, j'ai dû négocier avec les {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g} pour procéder aux réparations nécessaires, ce qui m'a coûté une quantité scandaleuse d'argent et de ressources. »
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

languages.text: "Ja, das stimmt. Und seine Entscheidung war völlig sinnlos. Es gibt verlässlichere Methoden, einen Bereich zu desinfizieren, ohne gleich einen ganzen Asteroiden zu verlieren. Sein Manöver destabilisierte die Station, und das hatte spürbare Konsequenzen, bis ich Lehnsherr wurde. Als ich mein Amt antrat, musste ich mit den {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriestern{/g} wegen der erforderlichen Reparaturen verhandeln, und das Ganze kostete mich absurd viel Geld und Ressourcen."
languages.original_text: "Yes, he did. And what a senseless decision it was. There are more reliable ways of disinfecting an area without having to lose a whole asteroid. That manoeuvre of his destabilised the station's integrity, and the consequences of that were still being felt up until I became Liege. When I entered office, I had to negotiate with the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} to make necessary repairs, and it cost me a preposterous amount of money and resources."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, das stimmt. Und seine Entscheidung war völlig sinnlos. Es gibt verlässlichere Methoden, einen Bereich zu desinfizieren, ohne gleich einen ganzen Asteroiden zu verlieren. Sein Manöver destabilisierte die Station, und das hatte spürbare Konsequenzen, bis ich Lehnsherr wurde. Als ich mein Amt antrat, musste ich mit den {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriestern{/g} wegen der erforderlichen Reparaturen verhandeln, und das Ganze kostete mich absurd viel Geld und Ressourcen."
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

languages.text: "Evet, doğrudur. Pek de manasız bir karardı. Koca bir asteroitten vazgeçmeden de bölgeleri dezenfekte etmenin yolları var. Üstelik daha emniyetli yollar bunlar. Zaten bu manevra da istasyonun bütünlüğünü öyle bir bozdu ki ben Emîr olana dek sonuçları hissedilmeye devam etti. Koltuğa oturduğumda gerekli onarımları yapmak için {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahipler{/g} ile pazarlık etmek zorunda kaldım ki bu da bana akıl almaz miktarda para ve kaynağa mal oldu."
languages.original_text: "Yes, he did. And what a senseless decision it was. There are more reliable ways of disinfecting an area without having to lose a whole asteroid. That manoeuvre of his destabilised the station's integrity, and the consequences of that were still being felt up until I became Liege. When I entered office, I had to negotiate with the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} to make necessary repairs, and it cost me a preposterous amount of money and resources."

traits.locale_text: "Evet, doğrudur. Pek de manasız bir karardı. Bölgeleri dezenfekte etmenin, tüm asteroidi yitirmekten daha güvenilir yolları var. Zaten bu manevra da istasyonun bütünlüğünü bozdu ve ben Emîr olana kadar sonuçları hâlâ hissediliyordu. Koltuğa oturduğumda gerekli onarımları yapmak için {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahipler{/g} ile pazarlık etmek zorunda kaldım ki bu bana akıl almaz miktarda para ve kaynağa mal oldu."
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege
